attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When you go and buy a new tv from the shop you should have a option that this tv has BBC channels or not. If you decide to purchase one with the BBC channels. Then you are asked to  fill out a form to purchase a tv licence. If you do not wish to have BBC on your television then you should be exempt from purchasing a tv licence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
